# bigflow

Returns the top 20 largest flow by premium for a stock

### Usage

```python wordwrap
/bigflow ticker
```

---

## Parameters

| Name | Description | Optional | Choices |
| ---- | ----------- | -------- | ------- |
| ticker | Stock Ticker | False | None |


---

## Examples

```
/bigflow AMD
```
---
